entry.content:
We look forward to meeting you

We hope you choose Clayhall Nursery and Pre-School for your childcare. We are endeavouring to become a community focal point for local parents and assist you in your busy lives by giving you peace of mind that your child is in a safe, happy, loving environment.

Your family will be part of our extended Clayhall family, where we will listen to your feedback as we continually improve our services in line with the early years curriculum. We look forward to meeting you soon!

Settling in

When your child starts at Clayhall Nursery and Pre-School, the settling in period is handled with the most loving care for your child and respect for their parents wishes. We are very flexible in our approach as we recognise that each child is different. We will ensure your child is settled in to ensure they feel comfortable and safe, plus ensuring parents are fully at ease.

Prior to starting, we have a settling in procedure. On the first day we ask that the parent stay with the child for a 2-hour period either 10am to 12pm or 2pm to 4pm. This allows the child’s relationship with the carers and other children in the room to develop and gives us an opportunity to learn your child’s routine and preferences.

entry.content:
We are situated in a beautiful large property, providing an intimate, warm and nurturing environment to care for your children

 

Our Nursery rooms

The nursery is organised into 3 main rooms, each child will have a key-worker who will be a parents main point of contact during your child’s time in the room.
The 3 rooms are:

Elephants room – 3 months to 2 years

 

Giraffes room – 2 years to 3 years

 

Bears* – 3 years to 5 years

 

*Pre-School

Outdoor Area

We have a spacious outdoor area that provides a stimulating environment for children to learn and play and most importantly enjoy the fresh air!

In 2018 we have expanded our garden area to include:
• a vegetable patch,
• a designated 0-2 year old play area
• adding a climbing frame and play house.
• forest school resources

entry.title: About Us
entry.summary: Here at Clayhall Nursery we live by our motto “….preparing for life…” The fast-paced modern world, the prevalence of social media and…
entry.content:
Here at Clayhall Nursery we live by our motto “….preparing for life…” The fast-paced modern world, the prevalence of social media and competition for schools and jobs, means there are new challenges and pressures faced by us all in this time, especially our children. Our mission is to provide an additional foundation away from the home, where your child will be brimming with self-confidence and also have assurance in their own abilities. We do this through the skills of our dedicated experienced team, where we follow the early years foundation stage curriculum, but also add our own innovative ways to learn.

Clayhall Nursery and Pre-School is available for children 3 months to 5 years old.

Opening hours are:

Monday to Friday

8am to 6pm

(excluding Christmas week and bank holidays)

Places are available for full days and half days.

We currently support the free 15 hours for 3 + year olds, please contact us as info@clayhallnursery.co.uk for more information.

More about us:

Clayhall Nursery and Pre-School is situated in Clayhall and is easily accessible from Barkingside, Gants Hill, Redbridge, Ilford and South Woodford.

We offer full and part time professional childcare and pre-school education for children from 3 months to 5 years old. We are open between 8.00am to 6.00pm Monday to Friday. We are closed for Christmas week and bank holidays.

Our Nursery is situated over two floors, providing a spacious, happy and relaxed atmosphere throughout. The Nursery has been designed for comfort and the safety of all children, and is registered with Ofsted (Office for standards in education). It is regularly inspected and we are a member of the Early Years Development and Childcare Partnership. The staff are encouraged to attend regular training and we are kept up to date with all new childcare areas.

Outside the Nursery there is a securely fenced hard and soft play area, which is used daily for all age groups.

More than just a nursery…

  • Clayhall Nursery achieved a Good rating in the last Ofsted Report.
  • We offer a wide range of activities for all ages and abilities, promoting valuable learning experiences for all children over and above what most nurseries provide.
  • We have exceptional and dedicated staff who are committed to ensuring the best possible care and education for your child – we are always learning how to improve.
  • We pride ourselves on our quality of care, education and overall provision.
  • We actively cater for all children’s needs and provide individually tailored support and learning experiences.
  • Our parents regard us very highly in the service we provide.
  • We promote a fun, warm, friendly atmosphere with lots of love and care.
  • We won an award for being the Most Inclusive Nursery in Redbridge, and we are proud of our recognised inclusive practices – The award is for our work and efforts with children with special educational needs, ensuring that their needs are met in an inclusive environment. These children are given an equal opportunity to learn and thrive through adaptation and modification of learning experiences alongside other children. Special care and attention is given to their differing needs and ability levels with an approach to enabling them to feel part of the group.
  • Our reading scheme for pre-school children has proved to be a great success.
